backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining data types (Event, Artist, UserProfile) and backend logic for managing artists, events, user profiles, radar events, and seed data initialization with role-based access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing three related features around fixing AdminInitButton's admin detection, loading state, and useActor readiness signaling, each mapped to specific files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-to-two sentence summaries of all frontend source files, serving as a reference index for the project's frontend components, pages, hooks, and configuration.
frontend/index.css: Defines OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark themes (background, foreground, card, border, chart colors, etc.) using Tailwind's base/components/utilities layers.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Techno Beacon app, loading the React app via main.tsx and setting the page title and favicon.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that sets up TanStack Router with all page routes, wraps the app in QueryClientProvider and ThemeProvider, and renders the Layout with Navigation, ProfileSetupModal, and Toaster.
Admin-only button component that checks admin status via useIsAdmin, shows a loading spinner while resolving, and triggers backend seed data initialization with success/error toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/ArtistCard.tsx: Displays an artist card with image, genre, event count, and a follow/unfollow button; clicking the card navigates to the artist detail page and a popup shows upcoming events.
frontend/src/components/ArtistEventPopup: A dialog popup that lists an artist's upcoming events sorted by date, allowing authenticated users to add/remove events from their radar or open the trip planner.
frontend/src/components/EventCard.tsx: Renders a single event card with venue, date/time, ticket links, and a radar toggle button; also supports opening a trip planner modal.
frontend/src/components/EventFilters.tsx: Provides filter inputs for artist name, city, and date range with active filter chips and a clear-all button for filtering event listings.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Displays a centered authentication prompt with a login button using Internet Identity, shown when a user needs to log in to access a feature.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Sticky top navigation bar with logo, nav links (Discover, Artists, My Radar), and auth controls (login/logout with user profile display) including a mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A non-dismissible dialog modal that prompts newly authenticated users to enter their name to set up their profile before using the app.
frontend/src/components/SourceBadge.tsx: Renders a colored badge for event sources (Resident Advisor, Bandsintown, Festicket) with source-specific neon color styles. Abbreviates 'Resident Advisor' to 'RA'.
frontend/src/components/TripPlannerModal: Modal dialog that helps users plan travel to an event by entering a home city and budget level, then generating Skyscanner flight and Booking.com hotel links with appropriate dates.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor using React Query, supporting both anonymous and authenticated (Internet Identity) usage, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and provider using DFINITY's AuthClient, exposing login/logout functions, identity state, and login status to child components.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data including events, artists, radar events, and tracked artists, all gated on actor availability and authentication state.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet importing Space Grotesk/Mono fonts, defining dark-theme CSS custom properties (neon amber/green palette), and adding utility classes for neon text/border effects and a scanline overlay.
frontend/src/lib/eventIdLookup.ts: Provides a static lookup map from composite keys (artistId + dateTime nanoseconds) to backend event IDs for all seeded events, with a helper function to retrieve an event's ID.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/ArtistDetailPage.tsx: Displays a single artist's detail page with a header image, genre, and a sorted grid of upcoming events fetched via React Query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/ArtistsPage.tsx: Lists all artists in a searchable, filterable grid with event counts per artist, and shows an admin init button for authenticated users.
frontend/src/pages/DiscoverPage.tsx: Browse and filter all events by artist, city, and date range, with artist chip filters and a hero banner; shows an admin init button when authenticated.
frontend/src/pages/MyRadarPage.tsx: Personal radar page showing a logged-in user's saved events and tracked artists; redirects unauthenticated users to a login prompt.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: Simple 404 page with a pulsing radio icon and a link back to the home route.
frontend/src/utils/ticketSearch.ts: Utility that builds ticket search URLs for DICE or Songkick given an artist name.
frontend/src/utils/travelLinks.ts: Provides a city-to-IATA airport code mapping and helper functions to normalise city names and generate Skyscanner-compatible travel links for event locations.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with helpers to persist, retrieve, and clear those parameters via sessionStorage and history.replaceState.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom fonts (Space Grotesk/Mono), OKLCH-based color tokens, zero border-radius, neon glow box shadows, and flicker/pulse keyframe animations.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file recording existing fix features (AdminInitButton visibility, spinner clearing, useActor readiness) and a pending backend audit task (AR-4) to verify admin principal detection.
